reviewText: My 3 year old son first knew Franklin from the books. Santa brought him this DVD for Christmas. He LOVES to watch Franklin now! There are some very cute episodes on here. I highly recommend this series. Franklin teaches wholesome character qualities, good manners and has great story lines that little kids can relate too. We love Franklin!!
Don't have to worry about leaving the room when Franklin is on. Pretty safe material for children and give it for gifts!

Franklin: The Best of Franklin will be a gift probably for my granddaughter but my grandson loves him very much and he will receive a different dvd - Franklin Hockey Hero. I like the fact that I can purchase the dvds and books from Amazon as they have a nice collection. Both children are 2 and 1/2 and 3.
My daughter absolutely loves Franklin and this DVD never leaves the car! It has many episodes and contains hours of great fun.

The Best of Franklin videos are wonderful and engaging for the children.  None of the episodes were more than 15 minutes so it's easy to pick one to watch if you don't want your child viewing the whole DVD in one sitting.

My 4 year old now insists on doing home, fire safety drills and knows how to be age if a fire were to occur- and thats just ONE episode on this disc! This is a one she loves to view over and over again!
Original Franklin! My kids love it
My son loves Franklin but doesn't seem to care for very many of these episodes.
I use this for guidance classes and the students love them.
